example.eg: What is the meaning of 'lean'?
example.egtrans: ‘lean' 是什么意思？

example.eg: He thought hard, trying to find the meaning of the puzzle clue.
example.egtrans: 他努力思考，想找出这个填字游戏提示词的意义。

example.eg: It's hard to tell with a typed message if someone's meaning is literal or ironic.
example.egtrans: 如果某人表达的是字面或讽刺意味，我们很难从打字信息中看出来。

example.eg: Events in Africa often have no meaning for people in India.  It doesn't affect their lives at all.
example.egtrans: 在非洲发生的事件通常对住在印度的人们来讲毫无意义，完全不会影响到他们的生活。

example.eg: What does the word 'available' mean?
example.egtrans: “available”这个词是什么意思呢？

example.eg: I'm sorry. I never meant to hurt you.
example.egtrans: 我很抱歉，我不是有意要伤害你的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有意做, 故意做, 意欲

example.eg: Did I just step on your foot? Sorry. I didn't mean to.
example.egtrans: 我刚刚是不是踩到你的脚了？抱歉，我不是故意的。

example.eg: A green light means "go."
example.egtrans: 绿灯表示可以通行。

example.eg: When the dog barks, it means that there is danger nearby.
example.egtrans: 狗吠叫意味着附近有危险。

example.eg: I really mean it when I say you're beautiful.
example.egtrans: 在我说你真美的时候，我是认真的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 是认真的, 是真诚的

example.eg: I don't mean her, I mean her husband!
example.egtrans: 我不是指她，我指的是她丈夫！

example.eg: He is a mean man, unlike his generous brother.
example.egtrans: 这个人很吝啬，一点也不像他慷慨大方的哥哥。

example.eg: That was a mean thing you did.
example.egtrans: 你这件事做得太缺德了吧。

example.eg: That's a mean imitation of an artwork.
example.egtrans: 那是一件低劣仿作艺术品。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 下等的, 差的, 低劣的

example.eg: My grandmother was just a mean factory worker.
example.egtrans: 我祖母只是个低等工厂工人。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 等级低的, 地位低的

example.eg: His motives are mean and vile.
example.egtrans: 他的动机卑鄙邪恶。

example.eg: He has a mean disposition, and grumbles at everything.
example.egtrans: 他性情古怪，对一切都抱怨个不停。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 脾气坏的, 暴躁的, 难讨好的

example.eg: He has a mean streak - you can see it in his eyes.
example.egtrans: 他禀性恶毒，你从他的眼神就能看出来。

example.eg: She was dressed in old and mean clothes, but was still the prettiest girl there.
example.egtrans: 尽管她身着破旧的衣服，不过她仍然是那里最漂亮的女孩。

example.eg: The bartender makes a mean martini.
example.egtrans: 调酒师调出了一杯出色的马提尼。

example.eg: That Frank is a mean bricklayer.
example.egtrans: 那个弗兰克是个技巧娴熟的砖匠。

example.eg: The mean score on the test was 70%.
Today's temperature is near the mean for this time of year.
example.egtrans: 今天的气温接近每年这个时期的气温均值。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 中间点, 中间项, 平均值

example.eg: The mean is the average value of a set of numbers.
Laura took up painting as a means of dealing with stress.
example.egtrans: 劳拉选择绘画作为纾解压力的方式。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 方式，方法, 手段，途径

example.eg: With his tools and his brain, he had the means to repair any stove.
Kevin lacks the means to buy a sports car.
example.egtrans: 凯文没有钱来买跑车。

example.eg: I mean to win that race, even if it kills me!
example.egtrans: 即便难于登天，我也一定要赢得那场比赛！

example.eg: Tony means to finish his drink in one gulp.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 打算做某事, 想要做某事, 意欲做某事

example.eg: A delay in our flight means a missed connection.
example.egtrans: 我们飞机晚点意味着会误了转机。

dsense.name: mean [sth]
dsense.guideword: informal (likely to result in) (非正式用语)

example.eg: This means war!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 可能造成, 可能导致

example.eg: No, I can't take you to your sister's house now, as that would mean driving across town and back in the rush hour.
Dictionaries explain the accepted meanings of words.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 通用意义, 公认意义

example.eg: After becoming religious, Julie found deeper meaning in the most mundane of tasks.
Much of the humour in Shakespeare's writing comes from double meanings.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 模棱两可, 双重意思

example.eg: That song is full of meaning to me.
When a student tells me how I helped him in life, it gives meaning to everything I do.
If you dissect the pun in that sentence, it carries an additional hidden meaning.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 未明说的意思, 未能言明的话

example.eg: When people say they are dying to see you, they don't expect you to take the literal meaning.
The spoiled kid gave new meaning to the word "brat.".
The real meaning of the word decimate is to kill one man in ten.
Love is the real meaning of life.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 真实含义, 真实意图

example.eg: The strict meaning of the word “Jew” is an Israelite of the tribe of Juda.
Flowers often have a symbolic meaning; red roses represent love, for example.
All of the holiday advertising makes us forget the true meaning of Christmas.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 真正的含义, 真正的意义, 真谛

example.eg: I had a hard time trying to determine the poem's underlying meaning.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 潜在的意义, 暗含的意义, 深层含义

example.eg: Sandra is well meaning, but can be a bit annoying.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 好意的，善意的, 好心的，好心眼的
